questions_and_notes: Can't this be directly calculated from snowfall_flux given the snow area fraction?  CF says: "The quantity with standard name mass_fraction_of_solid_precipitation_falling_onto_surface_snow is the mass of solid precipitation falling onto snow as a fraction of the mass of solid precipitation falling within the area of interest."
specific_issues: 8:Deprecate? Only 1 groups contributed this variable in CMIP6.
cell_methods: area: mean where land time: mean
long_name: Fraction of Snowfall (Including Hail and Graupel) on Snow
comment: The fraction of the snowfall which falls on the snow pack
